title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is a formidable weapon, characterized by its imposing design and striking crimson hue. This spear features a long, sleek shaft that tapers into a finely crafted point, making it lethal in battle. The head of the spear boasts an intricate motif, with sharp, jagged edges and a sinister aesthetic that hints at dark powers. Often associated with formidable warriors or malevolent sorcerers, this weapon not only serves as a tool for combat but also as a symbol of dominance and fear. Wielding this spear may imbue the user with enhanced abilities, making it a coveted item in the game.
